name: Your Name
intro: I am excited to apply for the Software Engineer role at Company Name.
body_paragraphs: At ClearEstate, I develop and enhance features across a Laravel PHP backend and Vue.js frontend, focusing on performance, scalability, and a great user experience.
Previously at Ecobee, I worked on production ETL and ML pipelines (Apache Beam, Kubeflow) and built evaluation tooling for computer vision models deployed on edge devices.
Earlier, as a co-founder at Pursuit Labs, I led engineering for an AI-powered product, collaborating closely on product specs and UX while driving from concept to early traction.
closing: I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience can contribute to Company Name.
